subject: Horse Racing
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The trainer Richard Dutrow Jr.’s 10-year ban from racing in New York is to begin Tuesday, but Dutrow’s lawyer will be seeking a stay in state court on Monday.
snippet: The trainer Richard Dutrow Jr.’s 10-year ban from racing in New York is to begin Tuesday, but Dutrow’s lawyer will be seeking a stay in state court on Monday.
